Articles.Content: Need more hype
Ok it is time, now or never guys?
What is the hype trains record # of pages
Onwards to 502!!!!
Gotta go so fast that the bad gateways can't catch us!
more hype!!!!!! We need to break 500!!!!!
The faster we post, the quicker it will be released
MAXMAPS TWEETED "#NotMuchLongerNow" GET HYYYYYPEEEEEE ![g6cYnyw.png](http://i.imgur.com/g6cYnyw.png)![g6cYnyw.png](http://i.imgur.com/g6cYnyw.png)![g6cYnyw.png](http://i.imgur.com/g6cYnyw.png)
Hyyyyyyyyyyyype!
Has the hype gone plaid yet?
I notice max mispelled countdown, lol

> 
> The faster we post, the quicker it will be released

Flawed logic.
1.0 releases at page 502 confirmed!!!!

> 
> What if all our hype is crashing the dev's systems and they can't release because of us!!!!!!!!!
> ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

Never say it! Hype is infallible, necessary and takes precedence over the actual release.
![contact_kerbal.png](https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/contact/contact_kerbal.png) the SMUG KERBb

like the elevator button...
